title: Poem 1's Indian workers and coerced migration

content.prompt: Which of the following best accounts for the circumstances of Indian workers alluded to in Poem 1 ?

choices.label: The increasing migration of Indian laborers to industrialized urban areas
The cultural divisions between Indian Muslim migrants and Indian Hindu migrants
The coerced migration of Indian indentured servants
The pattern of many Indian migrants returning to their homeland after their contracts ended

topic.text: 6.6: Causes of Migration in an Interconnected World

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
